import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useLocation, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useCart } from '../cartContext' const ShoppingCartSection = () => { const location = useLocation(); const [discount, setDiscount] = useState(0); const [couponCode, setCouponCode] = useState(''); const { cart, removeFromCart } = useCart(); const isKhmer = location.pathname.startsWith('/kh'); const currentLanguage = location.pathname.split('/')[1] || 'en'; const subtotal = cart.reduce((total, product) => total + product.price * product.quantity, 0); const total = subtotal - discount; const handleApplyCoupon = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (couponCode === 'vakhim') { setDiscount(1); } else { setDiscount(0); alert(isKhmer ? 'កូដបញ្ចុះតម្លៃមិនត្រឹមត្រូវទេ។' : 'Invalid coupon code.'); } }; return (
{/* */}
{cart.length === 0 ? ( ) : ( cart.map((product) => ( )) )}
{isKhmer ? 'ផលិតផល' : 'Product'} {isKhmer ? 'បរិមាណ' : 'Quantity'} {isKhmer ? 'សរុប' : 'Total'}
{isKhmer ? 'កន្រ្តកទំនិញរបស់អ្នកគឺទទេ។' : 'Your cart is empty.'}
${(product.price * product.quantity).toFixed(2)} removeFromCart(product.id)} style={{ cursor: 'pointer' }}>
{isKhmer ? 'ទិញទំនិញបន្ដ' : 'Continue Shopping'}
{isKhmer ? 'ធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពនៃកន្រ្ដក' : 'Update Cart'}
{isKhmer ? 'កូដបញ្ចុះតម្លៃ' : 'Discount codes'}
setCouponCode(e.target.value)} />
{isKhmer ? 'ចំណាយលើកន្រ្ដកសរុប' : 'Cart total'}
  • {isKhmer ? 'ចំណាយសរុប' : 'Subtotal'}{' '} ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
    • {discount > 0 && (
  • {isKhmer ? 'បញ្ចុះតម្លៃ' : 'Discount'}{' '} -${discount.toFixed(2)}
    • )}
  • {isKhmer ? 'សរុប' : 'Total'} ${total.toFixed(2)}
{/*
  • {isKhmer ? 'ចំណាយសរុប' : 'Subtotal'} ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
  • {isKhmer ? 'សរុប' : 'Total'} ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
*/} {isKhmer ? 'ដំណើរការនៃការគិតលុយ' : 'Proceed to checkout'}
{/* */}
) } export default ShoppingCartSection
